title: Technology Integration Instructional Design Workshop for Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental scientific subject knowledge and general digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A program for corporate science educators to enhance technology integration competencies. Conducted in a blended format (online theory + offline practice) with personalized learning support in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can select at least three digital tools suitable for science classes and explain how to integrate them into teaching and learning.
Teams can collaboratively develop technology-integrated lesson designs aligned with ISTE standards.
Learning data analysis tools can be utilized to measure the effectiveness of science lessons and propose improvements

resources: Digital Content Library for Science Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
